main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Moscow, Idaho on August 5, 1953, involving three unidentified objects.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for several hours, The objects were described as disk-shaped and approximately 270 feet in size, One object left a trail and traveled at a speed of 130 mph, Observers speculated it could be a natural meteorological phenomenon, There were two jets observed in the vicinity with negative results.
witness description: crew of observers during the sighting
